hero.desc: Here, KOL influence is minted as tradable assets. We use AI and Blockchain to empower digital identities with autonomous evolutionary vitality and economic value.
hero.feature_1_desc: Transform personal brand and influence into on-chain assets, enabling free circulation and instant monetization of value.
hero.feature_2_desc: 24/7 automated digital avatars handling interactions, transactions, and community management for KOLs.
hero.feature_3_desc: Smart contracts automatically distribute revenue, ensuring token value is strictly anchored to actual influence earnings.

market_analysis.title: Market Opportunities & Scale
market_analysis.desc: We are at the golden intersection of the Creator Economy ($700B) and Generative AI ($1.3T). KOLMarket.ai captures the core value of these two trillion-dollar markets through a unique "Digital Life" model.
market_analysis.creator_economy_desc: SOM Goal: Capture 1% market share within 5 years, corresponding to $2.1B annual influence asset transaction volume. Focusing on top KOLs with 100k+ high-stickiness fans.
market_analysis.ai_service_desc: SOM Goal: Occupy 0.5% of the high value-added digital service market within 5 years, corresponding to $1.3B revenue. Providing fully automated closed-loop services like consulting, design, and programming.

core_architecture.title: Economic Loop & Core Architecture
core_architecture.desc: Building a complete "Creation-Transaction-Application" digital life economic cycle system.
core_architecture.pillar_1_desc: Transforming social influence into programmable intelligent digital assets through AI deep learning and big data analysis.
core_architecture.pillar_2_desc: Providing a high-liquidity trading market to discover the true value of digital lives through real-time supply and demand.
core_architecture.pillar_3_desc: Unleashing digital life productivity to execute real-world commercial tasks and generate actual revenue.

whitepaper.title: KMT Ecosystem Whitepaper
whitepaper.subtitle: Economic Engine of Digital Life
whitepaper.intro: KOL Market Token (KMT) is the governance and utility token of the KOLMarket ecosystem, designed to capture the value of digital life creation and interaction.
whitepaper.burn_desc: We implement a strict "Proof of Burn" strategy, where protocol revenue is used to buy back and burn KMT, ensuring long-term value appreciation.
whitepaper.solana_desc: Leveraging Solana's high throughput and low latency to enable real-time micro-transactions for AI Agents.
